item.title: Iconic quotations of Zhongjing Liu, translated (1)
item.description: Preamble: Zhongjing Liu is a historian and a thought leader of China’s Alt-right. He is one of the theorists behind Greater China’s pendulum swing towards the right, which delivered the Hong Kong protests and …
